about_the_game:
The Test: Secrets of the Soul - Supporter Pack


This optional DLC pack is available if you wish to support the Developers.
This DLC does not affect settings within the game itself.

This pack includes 2 images in 3 different sizes for a total of 6 images that can be used as Desktop Wallpaper.

These images include pages from The Diary of The Madman.
Clues are placed within these images that may elude to a deeper, darker story behind The Madman.

The Diary of The Madman is a story that will be unveiled over time and leads into Chasing Demons which can be added to your Wish List on Steam now.

We appreciate your continued support along the way and we hope you've enjoyed your experiences!

(Players who comment may have their name selected to be characters in future episodes of our new Fateweaver series which can now be found on Steam.
All players who wish to be, will be added to the credits of "Chasing Demons" as a token of our appreciation for your support.)

- Randumb Studios
